Lead.title: Lead
Lead.description: Represents a lead in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Lead entity.

name.description: The full name of the lead or company.

company.description: The company name of the lead.

email.description: The email address of the lead.

phone.description: The phone number of the lead.

username.description: The username or social media handle of the lead.

tier.description: The quality tier of the lead.

score.description: A numerical score representing the lead's quality.

leadData.description: Raw lead data (e.g., JSON stringified CSV row).

status.description: Current status of the lead (e.g., Qualified, Not Qualified).

assignedCollaboratorId.description: Reference to Collaborator assigned to this lead. (Relationship: Collaborator 1:N Lead)

Collaborator.title: Collaborator
Collaborator.description: Represents a collaborator (user) in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Collaborator entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the collaborator.

username.description: The unique username for the collaborator.

role.description: The role of the user, can be 'admin' or 'collaborator'.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the collaborator's profile picture.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: Represents a note added to a lead.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Note entity.

leadId.description: Reference to the Lead this note belongs to. (Relationship: Lead 1:N Note)

collaboratorId.description: Reference to the Collaborator who created this note. (Relationship: Collaborator 1:N Note)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the note was created.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: Represents a group or team of collaborators.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Group entity.

collaboratorIds.description: List of collaborator IDs who are members of this group.

DistributionSetting.title: DistributionSetting
DistributionSetting.description: Defines the lead distribution rules for a specific group.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DistributionSetting entity.

groupId.description: Reference to the Group these settings apply to.

dailyQuota.description: The maximum number of leads to distribute to the group per day.

leadTier.description: The target lead tier for distribution.

definition.description: Stores collaborator profiles. A user can create their own profile upon signup and manage their own data. Admins have broader access.
Stores lead data. Only Admins can create leads. Assigned collaborators can update/delete.
Stores notes for each lead. The assigned collaborator or admins can manage notes.
Stores group information. Managed by admins.
Stores lead distribution settings for groups. Managed by admins.
